archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Service Performance Data Collection
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Developing and managing the service performance data collection schedules and supporting the monitoring activities to gather the resource performance data.

properties.value: â€¢ Establishing and managing service quality data collection schedules, including managing the collection of the necessary information from the Resource Data Collection & Distribution processes, to support proactive monitoring and analysis activity, and requests from Service Quality Management processes for additional data to support service instance performance analysis; â€¢ Management processes for additional data to support service instance performance analysis;
